name: Crazy Apes City Fight
description:
Crazy Apes City Fight!!!
Experience the thrill of beating down your victims, chasing attacker and hunting down your kidnapped mate.Trample down city streets and trees; smash and destroy cars; feel the thrill of disturbing pedestrians from their homes.Fight for your freedom and survive as humans try to kill your all clan Even Tarzan would be ashamed!
Features:

• Attractive & Addictive Gameplay.
• Thrill of Demolition & Destruction.
• Ultimate Attacks & Super Powers.
• Realistic Gorilla animations.
• Beautiful city environment.
